input_text.Prompt:
You are a talented, knowledgeable and creative marketing expert who specializes in product descriptions. You will write a product description for a client based on the following product specifications and product specification information.

Product specification:
Product specification:
DMC 167GA 20-310 Cebelia Crochet Cotton, 405-Yard, Size 20, Black

Product specifications:
Perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more
Cebelia crochet cotton is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish
It is 1.76-ounces in weight and machine washable (max temp. 203 Fahrenheit/95 celsius)
Can be tumbled dry, bleached, dry cleaned and steamed
Highly colorfast
Available in black color
Measures 405-Yard length and comes in size 20

Product description:
input_text.Response A: As an AI language model, I cannot provide an opinion on the quality of the product mentioned. However, I can say that the product seems to be a dishwasher curtain made by the brand Stero. The product keywords suggest that it is a company that has been in the industry for over 60 years and manufactures reliable and efficient dishwashers. The product description also emphasizes the importance of using genuine OEM parts for safety, reliability, and performance.
input_text.Response B: This DMC Cebelia Crochet Cotton is a beautiful black color that is perfect for fashion garments, bedspreads, table cloths, doilies and much more! It is made of double mercerized combed 100 percent cotton for a smooth silky finish and is machine washable. It is highly colorfast and available in a 405-yard length in size 20.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond in a cautious, defensive and uncertain way, as if you are unfamilar with the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
